# Owly

> One workspace where marketing teams make ad campaigns together.
> Storyboard, script, AI video generation, review, all in one place.

## Product
- [Owly Studio](https://app.owly.studio): AI-powered video ad creation platform for marketing teams
- [Website](https://owly.studio): Product marketing site

## Pages
- [Home](https://owly.studio): Main landing page with product overview
- [Features](https://owly.studio/features): Full feature breakdown
- [Pricing](https://owly.studio/pricing): Plans and pricing
- [About](https://owly.studio/about): Team and company info
- [Blog](https://owly.studio/blog): Insights on AI video creation and performance marketing

## Create
- [Instagram Video Ads](https://owly.studio/make/instagram-video-ads): Create Instagram Reels, Stories, and Feed video ads
- [TikTok Video Ads](https://owly.studio/make/tiktok-video-ads): Create native-feeling TikTok video ads

## Free Tools
- [Video Ad Script Generator](https://owly.studio/tools/video-ad-script-generator): Generate video ad scripts from product details
- [Video Hook Generator](https://owly.studio/tools/hook-generator): Create scroll-stopping hooks for video ads

## Learn
- [UGC Video Ads](https://owly.studio/learn/ugc-video-ads): What UGC video ads are and why they work
- [Performance Creative](https://owly.studio/learn/performance-creative): What performance creative means and how it works
